nodes.bodyText: Rather than remove this good work you already did, I would just modify the code which calls the function to always send false for now with a ToDo comment that for now logs aren't being included but if that changes later they can be sent.
That seems good to me! I advised Erica to remove code versus comment out, but I think the solution above is reasonable and ensures we can easily pick this back up.
Yeah it makes sense to me to remove the UI code but as far as this method goes it's optional, additional functionality so felt like it made sense to make an exception here.
